name: Wild Animal Sports Day
description: All your favourite Wild Animals are competing for the title of Wild Animal Champion of Champions! Tennis, Hurdles, Darts, Diving, Skiing, Pole-Vault, Trampolining and for the first time in a game Rhythmic Gymnastics! But watch out for King Croc! Wild Animal Sports Day (WASD) is out now!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: 2.0 Ghz Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: Intel HD 3000 Storage: 200 MB available space
